segments.text: Taking in the view, the kitchen has an open, airy feel from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's at the sink, attentively drying her dishware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on, filling the basin steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it's starting to overflow, water trickling over the rim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The flow's turning into a pour, hitting the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot already in the gathering water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy uses the stool to access the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies from the jar, plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems off-balance, legs not quite steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands close, arm extended in expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secretive smile about their raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden visible outside looks well-kept and sunny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a snapshot of domestic life with a hint of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a twinge of worry for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
